<br>

For an Immigration Policy Lab project on Syrian refugees in Lebanon, we combined data from UNHCR's Syrian refugees per locality (December 2018) with data on Lebanese voters per locality (using the 2018 elections). [The data can be accessed here.](https://dataverse.harvard.edu/dataset.xhtml?persistentId=doi:10.7910/DVN/YTUPB9)
